summary: The comparison failed because the second CSV file contains one more dam than the first CSV file. The dam 'Piano del Leone' is present in the second CSV but not in the first. Furthermore the dam name 'Garcia (M. Francese)' in the first CSV has a slightly different name 'GARCIA' in the second. Also the dam 'Leone' in the first CSV is named 'Piano del Leone' in the second one. Those differences in the dam names do not inficiate the validation.
